s.text: Albright added that the diplomatic string is running out and reiterated the U. S. position: U.N. weapons inspectors must have unconditional access to Iraqi sites.

Albright added that the diplomatic string is running out and reiterated the U. S. position: U.N. weapons inspectors must have unconditional access to Iraqi sites.
Albright added that the diplomatic string is running out and reiterated the U. S. position: U.N. weapons inspectors must have unconditional access to Iraqi sites.
And the LAT goes with Madeleine Albright's pronouncement that if allies can't be convinced, the U.S. is ready to launch military strikes against Iraq on its own.
